member.name: T:devDept.Eyeshot.HiddenLinesViewOnFileAutodesk
member.summary: Class that saves a vectorial image of the current scene of the active viewport on disk in DWG/DXF format.

member.name: F:devDept.Eyeshot.HiddenLinesViewOnFileAutodesk.FileName
member.summary: The name of the file to save.

member.name: F:devDept.Eyeshot.HiddenLinesViewOnFileAutodesk.Scale
member.summary: The scale of the drawing

member.name: F:devDept.Eyeshot.HiddenLinesViewOnFileAutodesk.Version
member.summary: The AutoCAD file version.

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.HiddenLinesViewOnFileAutodesk.Units
member.summary: The units of the design.
member.remarks: Affects units of the exported file.

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.HiddenLinesViewOnFileAutodesk.LineWeightUnits
member.summary: The units of the line weights.
member.remarks: Affects line weights of the exported file.
Set to to export all line weight values as default.

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.HiddenLinesViewOnFileAutodesk.AciColors
member.summary: If true, saves the colors as Aci colors (AutoCAD color index) if possible

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.HiddenLinesViewOnFileAutodesk.ForegroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color saved as foreground color ( AutoCAD color index 7).
member.remarks: Used only if colors are saved as , to choose which color( white or black) is saved with index 7, so that AutoCAD automatically display it in contrast with the background color.
member.exception: Thrown when trying to set a color different than white or black.

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.HiddenLinesViewOnFileAutodesk.PenSilhouette
member.summary: The pen used to draw the silhouettes.

member.summary: The pen used to draw the edges.

member.summary: The pen used to draw the wires.

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.HiddenLinesViewOnFileAutodesk.PenHiddenSilhouette
member.summary: The pen used to draw the hidden silhouettes.

member.summary: The pen used to draw the hidden edges.

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.HiddenLinesViewOnFileAutodesk.PenHiddenWire
member.summary: The pen used to draw the hidden wires.

member.name: T:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.Autodesk
member.summary: Helper class for or workunits.

member.name: M:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.Autodesk.InitializeServices
member.summary: Initializes the ODA services.
member.remarks: If not called explicitly, it's internally called when the first or workunit is ran.

member.name: T:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk
member.summary:
Helper class for loading DWG/DXF files. A list of supported entities follows.
Entity NameDetails
Point
Line
Arc
Circle
Ellipse
AttributeDefinition
Text
MText
Polyline
Polyline2D
Polyline3D
Spline
Face
PolyfaceMesh
PolygonMeshSimple, with no surface fitting or smoothing
MInsertBlock
BlockReference
RotatedDimension
AlignedDimension
RadialDimension
DiametricDimension
Solid
Brep
LoftedSurface
Region
Mline
Hatch
SubDMesh
RasterImage
Body
ExtrudedSurface

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk.SupportedLinearUnitsType
member.summary: Gets the supported linear units

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk.LayersToLoad
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of layers to load. Only the Entities on these layers will be loaded.
member.remarks: If null, all layers are loaded.

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk.Simplify
member.summary: Controls if generic surfaces are converted to , or and generic curves are converted to , or to improve import speed.

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk.SkipLayouts
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the layouts inside the paper spaces are skipped by the loading.

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk.SkipOleObjects
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Ole2Frame objects are skipped by the loading.

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk.ExtrudeByThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the curves or solid entities with a defined thickness value are extruded as Mesh or Surface.
member.remarks: When possible, the entities are extruded as surfaces, otherwise they are extruded as mesh.

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk.SkipProxies
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the proxies are skipped by the loading.

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk.FixErrors
member.summary: If true, checks the drawing database consistency and fixes the errors.

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the AutoCAD file password, can be null/Nothing..

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk.ForegroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color assigned to entities and layers that were saved with foreground color method ( AutoCAD color index 7).
member.exception: Thrown when trying to set a color different than white or black.

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk.SkipExternalReferences
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the external references are skipped by the loading.

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk.ModelXData
member.summary: Gets the XData value list of the Model_Space block.

member.name: P:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk.OriginalFileVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of the imported AutoCAD file.

member.name: M:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: File name constructor.
member.param: AutoCAD file password, can be null/Nothing.
When true, checks the drawing database consistency and fixes errors.
When true, proxies are not imported.

member.name: M:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Stream constructor.
member.param: AutoCAD file password, can be null/Nothing.
When true, checks the drawing database consistency and fixes errors.
When true, proxies are not imported.
member.remarks: The closing of the stream is delegated to you.

member.name: M:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.ReadAutodesk.CreateXRef(System.String,devDept.Geometry.Point3D,devDept.Eyeshot.IWorkspace,System.String,devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.autodeskExportType)
member.summary: Creates a block with the loaded entities, adds it to the , marks it as external reference and returns a BlockReference to that block.
member.param: The name of the block that will contain the loaded entities
Base point of the created BlockReference
The object to which add the block
The filename of the external reference. If empty, uses the name of the file read from disk or the ".dwg" if the file was read from a stream
The export mode that defines whether the file of the external reference will be written to disk in case of a subsequent call to . The ( export mode is not supported).
member.returns: The blockReference referring to the created block.

remarks.para: The block base point is taken from the .
The , , and are added to the and then are set to null.

member.summary: Creates a block with the loaded entities, adds it to the , marks it as external reference and returns a BlockReference to that block.

Base point of the created BlockReference
The object to which add the block
The filename of the external reference. If empty, uses the name of the file read from disk or the ".dwg" if the file was read from a stream
The export mode that defines whether the file of the external reference will be written to disk in case of a subsequent call to . The ( export mode is not supported).
member.returns: The blockReference referring to the created block.

The , , and are added to the and then are set to null.

member.name: M:devDept.Eyeshot.Translators.WriteAutodesk.#ctor(devDept.Eyeshot.Document,System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,devDept.Geometry.lineWeightUnitsType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Standard constructor with stream.
member.param: The document containing collections for export purpose.
Saves the colors as Aci colors (Autocad color index) if possible
If true, writes the stream in DXF ascii format, else in DWG binary format
If true, only selected entities at root level are written.
If true, purges all unused layers, line types, text styles and blocks from the saved file
member.remarks: If the file already exists, it will be overwritten.
less than support only Aci colors.

member.summary: Gets or sets the color saved as foreground color ( AutoCAD color index 7).
